external_games.name: Play Together - Starter Pack - Chic Black

name: Play Together: Starter Pack - Chic Black
summary: "What about my teardrop? There's nothing charming about it, so stop staring." Get the chic Black Delinquent Cat costume, a vehicle, in-game currencies, and tools in one bundle at a low price! Enjoy life in Play Together with this Starter Pack that's jam-packed with must-have items!
